memories.content: Paul prefers concise responses without excessive formatting
All API keys and secrets stored in HashiCorp Vault, never in .env files or code
memories.rationale: Security requirement - single source of truth for secrets, audit trail, rotation support

memories.content: Client websites are immutable references - never modify original, only create proxy experiment containers
memories.rationale: Container-on-container architecture principle - originals are sacred, experiments are ephemeral

memories.content: Agent memories must use the 8 canonical types with proper provenance - no untyped memory storage
memories.rationale: Schema-driven architecture prevents drift, enables conflict resolution and promotion paths

memories.content: Origin OS uses container-on-container architecture with LLMs as hypervisors
memories.rationale: Containers provide isolation, reproducibility, and sandboxing for agent experimentation

memories.content: Supreme X Detail serves as proof-of-concept for Origin OS retail optimization capabilities
memories.rationale: Own business provides full control for experimentation, real revenue data, and demonstrable ROI for future partners

memories.content: All container debug logs go to S3 with automatic credential management
memories.rationale: Centralized logging enables debugging across ephemeral containers, cost-effective storage

memories.content: Edge inference targets 5ms latency using Hailo-8 and similar accelerators
memories.rationale: Real-time retail monitoring requires sub-10ms response, Hailo-8 provides best power/performance ratio

memories.content: After MCP config changes: 1) Stop container, 2) Clear cache, 3) Restart container, 4) Verify connection
Session checkpointing: Call checkpoint() after completing significant work, update next_steps list, check for blockers
Crash recovery: 1) Run 'python3 ~/unified-memory/scripts/memory_client.py recover', 2) Read active_task, 3) Resume from next_steps
Launch Supreme X Detail automated booking and follow-up system
Complete unified memory framework with GitHub sync and migration tools
Thunderbolt bandwidth becomes bottleneck before storage speed for container orchestration
CDN-to-origin latency should target sub-20ms; colocate with CDN PoPs and use HTTP/2+ with connection reuse
Container restart required after MCP config changes - hot reload not reliable
Hardware inventory: Multiple Raspberry Pi units, Hailo-8, DX-M1, OAK-D cameras, various microcontrollers
GitHub username: cwalinapj
Supreme X Detail operates in Reno and Sparks, Nevada
Equity-based partnership model (% of profit increase) will be more attractive to retail partners than upfront licensing
Network effects from collective learning across partner stores will compound optimization gains
